website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic package for the beginner that includes gig bag, replacement strings, a tuner, and some other nice-to-haves.
pros: A comprehensive kit from a solid maker of guitars
You're not skimping on quality, though you're paying less than you might for some other acoustics from top makers
cons: Potential buyers should bear in mind that the lower three strings will still be made of steel

customer_reviews.title: ... the last year and 1/2 or so and have loved every moment with it
customer_reviews.text: Been playing this guitar everyday for the last year and 1/2 or so and have loved every moment with it. Survived many a hike and has taken on a warm tone. Really love this guitar and its pure utility. I don't have much to compare it to, but the intonation is great and the strings have died back into a really warm sound. It has been dropped and had all manner of crayons and food shoved into by my kids. It also helped me survive my way through a cattail marsh. I hope our fellow people making these guitars in Indonesia are getting payed a fair wage. I love this guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Hubby bought it for me
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to play. Now I am learning. I used to play a woodwind and like any new instrument, you have to gain strength in whatever you use to play it. My fingers and hands are stressing but its a good stress. Great guitar, beautiful. Highly recommend a strong stand. No pick came with this one, so be aware. I do not care because I wanna use my fingers, not a pick.
customer_reviews.author: Janel A.

customer_reviews.title: A good beginning bundle
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a good beginner's bundler. I like the accessories. Early on, my beginning learner broke a string, so it was handy to have spare strings included. Also, the tuner is a nifty little item (wish I had that when I was learning). The gig bag is unpadded, and the guitar sustained a few nicks right off the bat, so I upgraded to a padded bag with backpack handles. That system works MUCH better. The guitar itself has so far been adequate for my beginner 12 year old. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped fast, quality is good . Recommended for beginners !
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Damus

customer_reviews.title: Guitar quality okay
customer_reviews.text: Guitar quality was as expected, but packaging was not. Last time I bought a Yamaha guitar from another on-line music store, they added another layer of packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Hasan Mahmood

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner guitar for my 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner guitar for my 8 year old. Teacher was pleased with the choice and it sounds fantastic. All the extra items are a great bonus for the price!
customer_reviews.author: slackette

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to Anyone Buying a Classical/Spanish Guitar
customer_reviews.text: The guitar came so quick and when I opened it, the guitar was incredible. The guitar was beautiful, the tone is incredible, and accessories are extremely useful and worth the money. This product is amazing. I am blown away.
customer_reviews.author: Ogo Agubata

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for her birthday. It's very sturdy & she is just learning to play the guitar. It's a great one for starting out. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Mcknight

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it is splendid
customer_reviews.text: the guitar is very good, is all this and everything works great I really being too sastisfecha with this product

customer_reviews.title: Above and beyond my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Great ítem. I thought this will be a low quality guitar due the price. I was completely wrong. The only bad thing in this purchase is the guitar case quality is very low. But for the price, still a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rico
